A better way to start building.

Front End Developer

The practice of converting data to a graphical interface, through the use of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, so that users can view and interact with that data.

Back End Developer

Responsible for creating and maintaining technology at the back end of a website (the server, database and application).

PHP Developer

Software Developer who specialises in the design, testing and implementation of software using the PHP programming language.

JAVA Developer

Responsible for the design, development, and management of Java-based applications.
